name: Event Planning and Coordination
details: Overall event concept development and design. Budget planning and management. Vendor selection and management (catering, décor, entertainment, etc.). Timeline and schedule management.

name: Venue Selection and Management
details: Venue scouting and selection based on event requirements. Negotiating contracts and terms with the venue. Managing logistics and set-up at the chosen venue.

name: Catering and Food Services
details: Menu planning and customization based on event type and preferences. Coordination with catering companies or chefs. Food presentation and service during the event.

name: Décor and Design
details: Event theme and design conceptualization. Decoration selection, setup, and arrangement. Floral arrangements, lighting, table settings, etc.

name: Entertainment and Music
details: Booking and coordination of entertainment acts (bands, DJs, performers). Music selection and playlist creation based on event theme and audience. AV equipment rental and setup.

name: Invitation and RSVP Management
details: Design and distribution of invitations (physical or digital). RSVP tracking and guest list management.

name: Event Staffing and Coordination
details: Hiring and managing event staff (ushers, security, waitstaff, etc.). Staff training and event day coordination.

name: Photography and Videography
details: Hiring professional photographers and videographers. Capturing event moments and editing the footage.

name: Event Marketing and Promotion
details: Event promotion through various channels (social media, email marketing, etc.). Creating promotional materials (posters, flyers, banners).

name: Post-Event Evaluation and Analysis
details: Gathering feedback from attendees. Analyzing the success of the event and identifying areas for improvement. Budget reconciliation and financial analysis.

name: Themed Parties and Special Events
details: Planning and organizing themed parties (e.g., costume parties, retro-themed events). Specialty events like weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, and graduations.

name: Event Logistics and Transportation
details: Coordinating transportation for guests if needed. Managing event logistics, including parking and traffic management.
